dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 290 IH: Rural Telehealth and Education Enhancement Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Langworthy (for himself and Ms. Pingree) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Distance Learning and Telemedicine Program of the Department of Agriculture.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rural Telehealth and Education Enhancement Act of 2025.

section.header: Reauthorization of the Distance Learning and Telemedicine Program
section.text: Section 2335A of the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 (7 U.S.C. 950aaaâ€“5) is amended by striking 2023 and inserting 2030.
